document.full_text: attempts to control a nuclear reactor that exploded after the earthquake and subsequent tsunami in northern japan are continuing using water supply and steam release to cool it down, the top government spokesman said on sunday.
document.title: japan's edano: work under way to control reactor
lines_and_colors: attempts to control a nuclear reactor that exploded after the earthquake and subsequent tsunami in northern japan are continuing using water supply and steam release to cool it down, the top government spokesman said on sunday.
